$id: NAB AL Tools Template Settings Syntax
title: Root
description: Specifies the settings for NAB AL Tools Template Conversion

mappings.title: Mappings
mappings.description: Specifies all settings for how texts should be replaced and files renamed.

description.title: Description
description.description: Specifies a description of the current setting. This will be shown for the user.

example.title: Example
example.description: Specifies an example of what value should be supplied by the user. This will be shown for the user.

default.title: Default
default.description: Specifies a default value as a suggestion for the user. Use the special value $(guid) to get a new GUID as default value. This will be shown for the user, if supplied.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Specifies if this mapping should be hidden for the user. The default values would be applied without the user having the opportunity to modify it. If setting this to true, a default value must be provided. Hiding a mapping could be useful when having a autogenerated guid as default value.

maxLength.title: Max Length
maxLength.description: Specifies the maximum length of the text that the user can supply.

placeholderSubstitutions.title: Search and replace
placeholderSubstitutions.description: Specifies any settings for Search and replace text in files

path.description: Specifies the file path filter (glob pattern) that is used to select which files will be used for search & replace
path.title: Path

match.description: Specifies the text that will be replaced
match.title: Match

renameFiles.title: Rename Files
renameFiles.description: Specifies any settings for how files should be renamed.

path.title: Path
path.description: Specifies the file path for the file that should be renamed. This path does not support any wildcard.

match.title: Match
match.description: Specifies the text that will be replaced in the filename

createXlfLanguages.title: Create XLF Languages
createXlfLanguages.description: Specifies the language codes for the languages that XLF files should be created for. (Currently supported languages are found at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/compliance/apptest-countries-and-translations)

renumberObjects.title: Renumber objects
renumberObjects.description: Specifies if the AL objects should be renumbered according to the object range in app.json after all replacements are finished.

postConversionTasks.title: Post Conversion Tasks
postConversionTasks.description: Specifies commands to be run after conversion is completed. Commands are run in order of definition.

postConversionTaskItem.description: Defines a command to be executed by VSCode

command.description: The command as it is registered in VS Code.

openFile.description: Specifies a file path to be opened before running the task. The path should be relative to the workspace root.

reloadWindow.description: Specifies if VS Code should be reloaded after running the command. Uses 'workbench.action.reloadWindow'. Use with care and restraint.

transformation.description: Specifies if the text should be transformed before the replacement is done.
transformation.title: Text Transformation
